name: Contrax
description: What is the project about? ERC20 token that is backed by a utility. What makes your project unique? It allows users who invest in the token to use the utility to deploy their own smart contracts. History of your project. Project has been live for a week. During the lifetime of the project, the utility was developed and is fully functional. Whatâ€™s next for your project? Continue adding features to the utility and introduce tiers, encouraging investors to hold more tokens to use additional features within the utility What can your token be used for? Access to the utility telegram bot that allows them to deploy their own smart contracts on the ethereum or binance smart chain networks.
